useCase.name: "Data Security and Compliance Report Generation"

preconditions.precondition: All necessary security assessment tools and databases are accessible and functioning correctly.

useCase.trigger: Request for security details for a specific project.

mainSequence.step: Funder requests security details for a specific project.
DMPTool forwards the security details request to the SecurityAssessmentModule.
SecurityAssessmentModule assesses the security measures and standards for the project data.
ProjectData fetches the relevant security protocols for assessment from the databases.
ProjectData returns the collected security protocols to the SecurityAssessmentModule.
SecurityAssessmentModule verifies compliance with legal standards using information from the ComplianceDatabase.
ComplianceDatabase confirms and returns the compliance status to the SecurityAssessmentModule.
SecurityAssessmentModule compiles a security assessment report.
ReportGenerator generates and formats the security assessment report.
DMPTool provides the generated report to the Funder, outlining data security and compliance information.
